text: @realDonaldTrump I guarantee you @realDonaldTrump knows more about the #CoronaVirus more than perhaps anybody. Remember when he asked “you take a solid flu vaccine- you don’t think that would have an impact or much of an impact on corona?” I mean, just genius. No one would of thought about that!
